resources.string: The Mini Cooper is a great vehicle for people seeking athletic handling and brisk acceleration from a subcompact car. Its excellent road grip, firm suspension, sturdy brakes, and responsive steering help this vehicle move with an air of zippiness usually reserved for larger hatchbacks. The cabin is loaded with premium materials, and it has a stellar predicted reliability rating

The 2019 Honda CR-V has few weaknesses, which is why it ranks near the top of the compact SUV class. It boasts a comfortable ride, peppy engine choices, great safety scores, and a high-grade cabin with loads of passenger and cargo space.

The 2019 Toyota Camry Hybrid is a top choice in the midsize car class. It has a lively powertrain, solid predicted reliability, a large trunk, and loads of standard features, including the welcome addition of Apple CarPlay.
